statements: DELETE FROM resource_metrics WHERE server_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND server_id = '89abcdef-12d3-4567-a89b-426614174000';
DELETE FROM resource_utilization WHERE id = 1 AND utilization < 0.5;
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND metric_name = 'CPU';
DELETE FROM cloud_infrastructure WHERE region = 'us-west' AND status = 'offline';
DELETE FROM cloud_instances WHERE region = 'us-west' AND instance_status = 'terminated';
